verbs.description: Trumpism [V: has] taken over the Republican Party . So it seems the GOP needs a " blue wave " in the midterm elections to kick some sense back into them .
[ARG0: Trumpism] has [V: taken] over [ARG1: the Republican Party] . So it seems the GOP needs a " blue wave " in the midterm elections to kick some sense back into them .
Trumpism has taken over the Republican Party . So it [V: seems] [ARG1: the GOP needs a " blue wave " in the midterm elections to kick some sense back into them] .
Trumpism has taken over the Republican Party . So it seems [ARG0: the GOP] [V: needs] [ARG1: a " blue wave " in the midterm elections] [ARGM-PRP: to kick some sense back into them] .
Trumpism has taken over the Republican Party . So it seems the GOP needs a " blue wave " in the midterm elections to [V: kick] [ARG1: some sense] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG2: into them] .
